name: Scarlett Phoenix
profile:
Hi. I'm Jennifer. I am an Intuitive Tarot Reader, Empath, and passionate lover of the Esoteric. I use my knowledge of Tarot and strong connection to Spirit to offer perspective and guidance to those seeking it. 

If you would like to book a personal reading with me, email me at thescarlettphoenix@gmail.com


DISCLAIMER:
This channel is for entertainment purposes only and any advice given in my readings is not meant to take the place of professional medical, psychiatric, legal, financial or other type of advice. It is the responsibility of the viewer to make his/her own decisions.This channel assumes no liability for any personal decisions the viewer makes. Please remember that energy is fluid and subject to free will fluctuation, so there is no guarantee that anything predicted in any reading will actually manifest in the material realm. I simply pull the energies around you from Spirit on a given day.
